title: A solution for fillet quality: Slaughter age's effect on protein mechanism and oxidation
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Ayşe Kara, Ahmet Akkose, Sevda Urçar Gelen, Arzu Uçar, Veysel Parlak, Esat Mahmut Kocaman, Muhammed Atamanalp, Nicoleta Anca Şuţan, Ghadeer M. Albadrani, Muath Q. Al-Ghadi, Mohamed M. Abdel-Daim, Gonca Alak
